data.title: Facts About Julia Roberts: 11 Interesting Truths About Her
data.meta_description: If you are a Julia Roberts fan, read our blog on 11 unknown facts about Julia Roberts. Gain knowledge about the Pretty Woman Star
data.text:
Many people know and admire Julia Roberts for her accomplishments as a Hollywood actress. First and foremost, she has starred in dozens of films over three decades and won various prizes and accolades. Moreover, she also ranks among the world’s most beautiful and important individuals. However, how well do you know her? In this blog post, we reveal 11 surprising facts about Julia Roberts that you may not have heard before. Not only will these facts give you a glimpse of her life and career from a different perspective, but they will also make you appreciate her more. So, are you curious to find out more? Read on.

Who is Julia Roberts?

Julia Roberts is an American actress who has succeeded in many films. Furthermore, for her acting, she has received an Oscar, a BAFTA, and three Golden Globes. In addition, she is also one of the world’s most successful and influential actors. Notably, Julia Roberts is worth 250 million dollars. Born in Georgia in 1967, she has two acting siblings. However, she dropped out of college and relocated to New York to pursue her acting career. Following early roles in Mystic Pizza (1988) and Steel Magnolias (1989), Roberts rose to fame as a leading actress in the top-grossing romantic comedy Pretty Woman (1990). Moreover, she is an animal lover, philanthropist, and producer.

Facts About Julia Roberts

She Is the First Actress to Reach the $20 Million Mark for a Single Film:

In 2000, a remarkable and believable performance in the picture based on a true event was given by Julia Roberts, who played Erin Brockovich, a legal clerk fighting against a large corporation that was poisoning California’s water supply. Her first and only Academy Award for Best Actress, as well as a Golden Globe, a BAFTA, and a Screen Actors Guild Award, were received for her role. Furthermore, history was made by Roberts as she became the first actress to be paid $20 million for a single film, an important accomplishment showing that female performers could be paid as much as male actors, who had previously received $20 million or more. This is one of the facts about Julia Roberts that makes her an inspiration for women globally.

Her Name Has Been Included in the People Magazine’s “50 Most Beautiful People in the World” Multiple Times:

This is one of the facts about Julia Roberts that shows us how much she is admired and how lovely she is. People Magazine is a famous magazine in America. It writes about famous and interesting people. Every year, the magazine makes a special book. It is called “The 50 Most Beautiful People in the World”. It has pictures and stories of very good-looking and stylish people. Julia Roberts is in this book more than anyone else. She was on the cover of this book five times. The years in which her name was listed in the magazine were as follows: 1991, 2000, 2005, 2010, and 2017.

She Owns Her Own Production Company Known as Red Om Films:

Julia Roberts works as a producer and businesswoman besides acting. She co-founded Red Om Films with her sister, Lisa Roberts Gillan, and her husband, Daniel Moder, in 2002. The name of the company is her husband’s name, Daniel Moder, in the form of an anagram. Julia Roberts has acted in or executive produced various films and television shows that Red Om Films made, such as Mona Lisa Smile, Eat Pray Love, Homecoming, and others. Red Om Films is famous for making the first four films in the American Girl series, which are based on popular dolls and books for young girls. They are Samantha: An American Girl Holiday, Felicity: An American Girl Adventure, Kit Kittredge: An American Girl, and Molly: An American Girl on the Home Front. The Hollywood icon uses her production company to create different and important projects that show her skills and interests.

Julia Roberts Is Famous For Her Charity:

The actress is a well-known actress who also volunteers for many charities. She is an advocate for a variety of causes, including AIDS, children, education, the environment, health, human rights, and women. She has volunteered for UNICEF, the Red Cross, GLSEN, and other organizations. The actress has given money, raised awareness, and attended events. She has also narrated a documentary about the rare genetic disorder Rett syndrome. Julia Roberts is a spokesperson for Earth Biofuels, a renewable energy firm. She also owns her own production company, Red Om Films, which creates socially conscious films and television shows. This is one of the facts about Julia Roberts that makes her a fan favorite globally.

Julia Roberts Converted to Hinduism In 2010:

Roberts was raised by a Catholic mother and a Baptist father before converting to Hinduism in 2010. She stated that she became interested in Hinduism after seeing a photograph of a guru named Neem Karoli Baba, who died in 1973. She also traveled to India for the film Eat, Pray, Love, which is about a woman’s spiritual journey. In September 2009, Swami Daram Dev of Pataudi’s Ashram Hari Mandir gave Roberts’ children Hindu god names: Laxmi for Hazel, Krishna Balram for Henry, and Ganesh for Phinnaeus. She claims to practice Hinduism with her husband and children, and she visits the temple to chant, worship, and celebrate. This is one of the most fascinating facts about Julia Roberts.

Robert Didn’t Complete Her Graduation:

Julia attended Fitzhugh Lee Elementary, Griffin Middle, and Campbell High Schools from 1972 to 1985. She played clarinet in the Campbell High School band. She graduated from Campbell High School and enrolled at Georgia State University. However, she did not finish her degree because she went to New York to chase her acting dream. Her older brother, Eric Roberts, inspired her. He was also an actor and recommended her for his role in Blood Red. She did not get a diploma, but many universities gave her honorary degrees. They include California State University, Georgia State University, and Miami University. This is one of the facts about Julia Roberts that highlights their determination to fulfill her goals.

Julia Robert’s Family Is Full Of Actors:

A family of actors who have been involved in the entertainment industry for decades is where Julia Roberts comes from. Her parents, Betty Lou Bredemus and Walter Grady Roberts founded the Atlanta Actors and Writers Workshop in 1978. They were both actors and playwrights. Her older brother, Eric Roberts, is also an actor. He has appeared in films such as The Dark Knight and The Hunger Games. Her older sister, Lisa Roberts Gillan, is a film producer. She has worked on projects such as The Queen, The Theory of Everything, and The Crown. Her niece, Emma Roberts, is also an actress. She has starred in films such as Scream Queens, We’re the Millers, and American Horror Story. Julia Roberts’ family influenced her career and pushed her to pursue her dream of being an actress.

Julia’s Father was Martin Luther King Jr.’s Daughter’s Acting Coach:

Walter and Betty Roberts, Julia’s parents, established the Actors and Writers Workshop in Atlanta. They taught children to act there. Martin Luther King Jr. and Coretta Scott King’s children attended the school. Walter Roberts was the acting coach for their daughter, Yolanda. He helped her develop her performance skills and confidence. He also taught her about Martin Luther King Jr.’s work and legacy. Yolanda became an actor later. She appeared in films such as The Color Purple, Malcolm X, and The Help. Martin Luther King Jr. and Coretta Scott King paid the hospital expenses kindly when Julia was born. Very few people know this fact about Julia Roberts.

Robert’s Has Been Married Twice:

Julia Roberts has married twice in her life. She married Lyle Lovett, a musician and actor, as her first husband. They met on the production of The Player in 1992. They divorced in March 1995, after only two years of marriage. She married Daniel Moder, a cinematographer, as her second husband. They met on the set of The Mexican in 2000. They have three children: twins Hazel and Phinnaeus, and a son Henry. Julia Roberts and Daniel Moder are still married. Their 20th wedding anniversary was in 2022. Additionally, she has also been accused of being involved with other actors such as Jason Patric, Kiefer Sutherland, Liam Neeson, Mathew Perry, and Benjamin Bratt. However, none of these accusations have had any solid proof.

Forbes Magazine Named Her One of the Richest Women in Entertainment in 2007, and One of the Top Celeb Working Mothers in 2008.

Julia Roberts earned $20 million in 2007, ranking her as the 12th richest woman in Hollywood. Her work in films such as Charlie Wilson’s War and Ocean’s Thirteen earned her the highest pay of any actress on the list. Forbes classified her as the eighth-best celeb working mommy in 2008, with an estimated income of $15 million. She had been recognized for managing her job and family. She and her husband Daniel Moder had three children. Roberts also donated to organizations such as UNICEF and the Red Cross. Forbes honored Julia Roberts for her success and impact in the entertainment industry, as well as her devotion and kindness as a mother. This is one of the facts about Julia Roberts that directly shows us proof of her success.

Julia Roberts Initially Turned Down the Role of Annie Reed in Sleepless Seattle:

Julia received an offer from Rob Reiner, the filmmaker, but she turned it down. She understood that the film’s premise was absurd, and she feared being typecast as a romantic lead. She had other films to work on at the time, such as Pretty Woman and The Pelican Brief. Meg Ryan was not the first choice for Annie. The filmmakers considered Kim Basinger, Michelle Pfeiffer, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Jodie Foster, Demi Moore, Natasha Richardson, and Nicole Kidman before her. Ryan got the role of Annie Reed in Sleepless in Seattle as the sixth choice. Julia changed her mind and accepted the part after Reiner convinced her that she could portray both a sophisticated and independent woman and a tender and romantic one. This fact shows how iconic Julia Roberts is.

We have shared 11 facts about Julia Roberts that you may not have known before. You can see that she is not only a great and skilled performer, but also a fascinating and inspiring individual. She has overcome many obstacles and barriers in her life and career and achieved remarkable things. She has also used her fame and money to help the world. We hope this blog entertained you and taught you new things about Julia Roberts. Thank you for reading our blog.

Sushmita Nibandhe
